# About me
My name is Yimeng Shang, now a last-year Ph.D. student in biostatistics in [Penn State University](https://med.psu.edu/biostatistics-phd). I got my Master's degree in the Mailman School of Public Health in [Columbia University in the city of New York](https://www.columbia.edu/). 

My research mainly involves using <b>causal inference</b> with observational data, including robust propensity score estimation and measurement error of treatment assignment. 

I took courses in Biostatistical methods, Probability, Statistical Inference, Causal Inference, Data Science, Clinical Trial Methodology, Survival Analysis, Epidemiology, Statistical Computing
<!-- , Machine Learning and Data Mining -->.

Learn more from [here](aboutme.html) and from my [resume](CV.pdf).
